sports: A basketball in the hands of a football player is just a ball.
To be born tall is a gift. To reach for the stars is a talent.
A swimmer with no pool is like a shark with no ocean.
Lebron is good. But not that good.
One cannot truly be great, until they are okay.
Never trust Ryan Fitzpatrick in the fantasy playoffs.
food: An asparagus by any other name is a leak.
A sweet potato is but a nicer potato.
Rice is ice, but with an extra R.
Nothing is quite as sweet as a box of Nerds candy.
Your stomach is only as strong as your fork hand.
life: A life partner is someone you trust; someone who will be there for you.
Christmas to a child is the first terrible proof that to travel hopefully is better than to arrive.
A friend who is there for you is a friend indeed.
Being the bigger person wins any argument.
The secret to a happy life is plenty of friends.
You cannot defeat a winning attitude.
relationships: If you don't want burnt toast, make it yourself.
A woman in the kitchen is worth two in the hand.
Men and women behave together much like cats and dogs.
